category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 19 (Compulsory Retirement/Dismissal of Executives)
contents: Article 19 (Compulsory retirement/dismissal of executives) ① When an executive falls under any of the provisions of Article 18, he/she shall compulsorily retire from office. Revised April 1, 2019, ② If an officer falls under any of the following items, the appointing authority may dismiss the officer. Revised on January 5, 2022, 1. When it is recognized that a person is unable to perform normal duties due to a physical or mental disability, 2. When he/she violates his/her duties on the job, 3. When the Corporation suffers losses due to intent or gross negligence. 4. When the fund director falls under the grounds for dismissal as stipulated in the contract concluded with the chairman pursuant to Article 31 (6) of the Act.
